== Main inclusion report for gnome-python-extras ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/gnome-python-extras, compiled on all arches.

2. ''Rationale:'' Dependency of `serpentine` which was requested to go into main.

3. ''Security:''
* No CANs.
* No Secunia record.

4. ''QA:''
* Installation: Library, no end user tool.
* Bugs: No Debian bugs, Sebastian Bacher is the maintainer.
* No special hardware interaction.

5. ''Standards compliance:''
* Standard `debhelper` packaging.
* FHS met.
* Debian package and library policy met.
